SELECT A.nick, A.stored_pic AS userPic, B.title, B.iboard, B.view , B.created_at AS createdAt , if(C.iuser > 0, 0, 1) AS isLiked, SQ.cnt AS boardLikeCnt , B.status FROM user A JOIN board B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
left JOIN (SELECT iuser, iboard, count(iboard) as cnt from board_like group by iboard) SQ on B.iboard = SQ.iboard
LEFT JOIN board_like C ON B.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.status = #{status}
AND B.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
AND (B.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR B.contents LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
AND A.nick LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY B.iboard DESC
GROUP BY B.iboard order by SQ.cnt desc, B.iboard desc
ORDER BY B.view DESC
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{rowCount}

SELECT A.iuser, A.nick, A.stored_pic AS userPic, B.iboard , B.title, B.contents, B.view , B.created_at AS createdAt, if(C.iuser > 0, 0, 1) AS isLiked , C.cnt AS boardLikeCount, B.status FROM user A JOIN board B ON A.iuser = B.iuser
LEFT JOIN (select iuser, iboard, count(iboard) As cnt from board_like where iboard = #{iboard}) C ON B.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.iboard = #{iboard} and B.status = #{status}
